item.title: Algerian Revolt
item.description: Let's talk about a revolution that wasn't just a chapter in a history book, but a raw, bloody fight for a people's very identity.

item.title: Earth: The Pale Blue Dot We Call Home
item.description: Earth is more than just the third planet from the Sun; it is, as far as we know, a unique oasis of life in the vast emptiness of space. A swirling marble of blue, white, and green, it is our only home, and its story is one of dynamic change, incredible resilience, and profound beauty.

item.title: Testing My New Hugo Website
item.description: A test article to verify my Hugo website is working properly

item.title: About
item.description:
About DZWIRE

Welcome to DZWIRE!

I share articles about Algeria, covering its culture, history, and current events, as well as stories and insights from around the world.

My goal is to provide informative, engaging, and well-researched content that helps readers explore topics they care about — from local Algerian heritage to global events and ideas.

Thank you for visiting, and I hope you enjoy reading and learning from the articles here.

item.title: Contact
item.description:
Contact DZWIRE

I’d love to hear from you!

If you have questions, feedback, or suggestions, you can reach me via email:

Email: tuviretinfo@gmail.com

I do my best to respond to messages in a timely manner. Thank you for visiting DZWIRE!

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description:
Last updated: 11/08/2025

Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information on this website.

Information We Collect

  • We do not collect personally identifiable information (PII) directly.
  • This website uses Google Analytics to collect anonymous usage data such as page views, session duration, and general visitor demographics.

How Google Analytics Works

  • Google Analytics uses cookies to track website usage anonymously.
  • No data collected by Google Analytics is personally identifiable unless you are logged into a Google account and interact with other Google services.
  • For more information, you can review Google’s Privacy Policy.

Data Security

  • Our website is hosted as a static site on GitHub Pages, which is served over HTTPS to protect your connection.
  • We do not store any personal data on our servers.

Children’s Privacy

  • This website is not intended for children under 13.
  • We do not knowingly collect information from children.

Changes to This Policy

  • We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time.
  • The updated policy will be posted on this page with the “Effective Date” updated.

Contact Us

If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:
tuviretinfo@gmail.com
